Articles.Content:
Anyone know this game? Based off agar.io I think. It's been around for nearly a year and I like to play it after an extreme mission faliure. Then, after an extreme death in this game, I like to go on an extreme mission!

If you find an orange one with a weird blade dangly head bit and it's named way of the worm, that's me!

Yep, if you see YT_Cakeatron that's me.

Also have you heard of diep.io ?
Does it have as many ads as agar.io? If not, I might try it.

Sadly, the ads are creeping in. Sometimes you get one before startup. I play sometimes as i oppose the new ads.

Although no, there aren't ads plastered all over it.

actually, that's the exact same thing I do.

So, I play it a lot.
